content.raw:
This is an "old" version of the vehicle - the [new one here](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/25/polaris-raise-steering-wheel-add-collision/diff) uses the same model for collision and visuals. However only revision ``147d0f1`` seems to work properly for me, the changes made two days ago don't (and when they do they show a different collision model similar to what you have I think).

Edit:
I just found out that the only difference between the model used in ``147d0f1`` and the one aded in ``5631041`` is that the sdf version got changed from ``1.3`` to ``1.4`` which somehow breaks it for me. Changing the sdf version in ``model-1_4.sdf`` to ``1.3`` makes it work.
content.html:
This is an "old" version of the vehicle - the new one here uses the same model for collision and visuals. However only revision 147d0f1 seems to work properly for me, the changes made two days ago don't (and when they do they show a different collision model similar to what you have I think).

Edit: I just found out that the only difference between the model used in 147d0f1 and the one aded in 5631041 is that the sdf version got changed from 1.3 to 1.4 which somehow breaks it for me. Changing the sdf version in model-1_4.sdf to 1.3 makes it work.
